title: Client Crash after every game
body:
My client has been crashing consistently after i press continue to exit the game to the stats menu. It also frequently disconnects while I'm not in game, but have a different window open. I've tried repair, but the problem remains. Any help would be appreciated. 
I've had this issue before, but I don't remember how I fixed it the first time, or if it just went away.

replies.body:
This issue often happens if your client disconnects from the game platform service entirely. These types of disconnections are frequently caused by network settings that are incompatible with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolve this.

Let me know if those steps fixed this.
